name: .MCREATOR File Extension
summary: Learn about .MCREATOR files and view a list of programs that open them.

instructions: You can open an MCREATOR file in MCreator (multiplatform). First, make sure the MCREATOR file is stored in the appropriate MCreator project directory. Then, open MCreator, select File â†’ Open workspace..., and navigate to and open your MCREATOR file. After you do, the project your MCREATOR file describes will open in MCreator.
You can also open an MCREATOR file in Microsoft Notepad, Apple TextEdit, or any other text editor, to view the JSON data it contains.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
